answers.answer: Sex therapists do not do "hands on" .If you are having an erectile dysfunction, you should make an appointment with your doctor to do a blood test to check your hormone levels.  And also go through any medications that you are taking.If you suffer from diabetes, you already may have nerve damage.  Other medications can also affect libido and performance.
